title: IDirectInputJoyConfig8::Acquire (dinputd.h)
description: The IDirectInputJoyConfig8::Acquire method acquires "joystick configuration mode." Only one application can be in joystick configuration mode at a time; subsequent attempts by other applications to acquire this mode should receive the error DIERR_OTHERAPPHASPRIO. After entering configuration mode, the application can make alterations to the global joystick configuration settings. The application should check the existing settings before installing the new ones in case another application changed the settings in the interim.
